panels.description: The heatmap categorizes disk utilization into discrete buckets (e.g util 0-5) and shows the frequency of the number of disks that fall within that range as a color. The color chosen depends on the number of disks in the 'bucket', ranging from green (low) to red (high). Hover over a colored block to show the count of disk utilization observations at that point.
panels.title: Disk Drive Utilization Heatmap - $osd_servers

rows.title: OSD Host CPU and Network Load
